name: DeFaster
description: You have to play a cannon right in the middle of the battle, dangerous projectiles will be launched in you, which will cause damage when touched. You need to move the shield so as to reflect as many shells as possible, and this will all happen under a pleasant soundtrack...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel celeron Graphics: GeForce GTX 480 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel core DUO Graphics: Radeon R7 265 Storage: 100 MB available space
